data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Reports are very often created as text files using formats. These
    files are then displayed in a window. The ReportBox displays the
    text file either as a readonly text object or in a listbox, where
    the items in the list may be selected for further manipulating. The
    widget also has buttons for printing and saving the report under a
    new file name. This is a very simple widget, but i have found that
    it saves a lot of time for the programmer.
